driver = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="d520983d7e7cb83b15f95508aa6c1533")>

    @allure.feature("BA Connection Test")
    @allure.story("Verify tester connection")
    @pytest.mark.sanity
    def test_connect_to_tester(driver):
        BA_URL = "http://localhost:2004"
        TESTER_IP = "192.168.5.63"
    
        with allure.step("Open BA URL"):
            driver.get(BA_URL)
    
        with allure.step("Enter IP Address"):
            ip_clear = driver.find_element(By.XPATH, "//span[@class='rc-select-selection__clear']")  # Update ID
            ip_clear.click()
            time.sleep(5)
    
            ip_input = driver.find_element(By.XPATH, "//input[@class='rc-select-search__field']")
    
            ip_input.send_keys(TESTER_IP)
            ip_input.send_keys(Keys.RETURN)
            time.sleep(10)
    
        with allure.step("Click Connect"):
            connect_button = driver.find_element(By.XPATH, "//button[@id='connectionsetup_connect_button']")  # Update ID
            connect_button.click()
            time.sleep(5)
    
        with allure.step("Check Tester Status in Port Details"):
            status_element = driver.find_element(By.XPATH, "//td[@class='panel-connection-setup-tester-info tester-info-border device-details-border']/div[@class='right-spacing-tester']/b")  # Update ID
